title: Indexing Narcotics, Fentanyl, and Opioids Act of 2017
content: Indexing Narcotics, Fentanyl, and Opioids Act of 2017 or the INFO Act This bill requires the Secretary of Health and Human Servicesnbsp, to appoint a federal coordinatornbsp, within the Department of Health and Human Services to: coordinatenbsp. Programs related to opioid abuse reduction, liaise with state and local entities carrying out activities relating to opioid abuse reduction, and establish and operate a publicly available electronic databasenbsp, to facilitatenbsp, data collectionnbsp, related tonbsp, opioid abuse.
